name: deindustrialization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process by which a country or area depends less and less on industry to provide most of its work or income: the deindustrialization of America/the Northeast of England

Add to word list
Add to word list
the reduction of the amount of industry in an area or a country: The photographs show Philadelphia rising up in the industrial age and deteriorating through the post-war years of deindustrialization.
